input.repo_snapshot_md:
# MOVA Skills Lab (2025-12-10)

- Red core: `core/mova` MOVA 4.0.0 contracts (unchanged).
- Yellow layer: infra skills and bindings validated via npm test.
- Green layer: lab workflow schemas/envelopes added (WF_LAB_01), WF-EX-001 baseline artifacts and run examples recorded (WF_LAB_02/03).
- Current goal: add metrics to baseline run, produce baseline-only experiment result, aggregate envelope example, validate via mova_check_basic, snapshot WF_LAB_04.
